title: Kimpton's Hurlburt on Renovated Morrison House Hotel (Audio)
itunes:title: Kimpton's Hurlburt on Renovated Morrison House Hotel (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Matt Hurlburt, Area Director of Operations for Kimpton Hotels & Restaurants, on the hospitality industry and the new Morrison House hotel in Alexandria. Broadcasting live from the Kimpton Morrison House Hotel in Alexandria, Virginia.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
